title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it does not take effect.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the PDF. 
2. Open the 'Properties' view. 
3. Set the sectionDisplay property to 'none'. 
4. Observe that the item is still visible in the PDF.
